This demo illustrates application of `sceptre` to a small example dataset. The function presented in this tutorial, `run_sceptre_gRNA_gene_pair`, is for demonstration purposes only and should not be used in practice. First, we install the `sceptre` package from Github (if we have not yet done so).

```{r setup}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Katsevich-Lab/sceptre")
```
